[@microsoft/fast-components](./fast-components.md) &gt; [fastAnchor](./fast-components.fastanchor.md)

## fastAnchor variable

A function that returns a [Anchor](./fast-foundation.anchor.md) registration for configuring the component with a DesignSystem. Implements [anchorTemplate](./fast-foundation.anchortemplate.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fastAnchor: (overrideDefinition?: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").OverrideFoundationElementDefinition<{
    baseName: string;
    baseClass: typeof FoundationAnchor;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<FoundationAnchor, any>, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").AnchorOptions>;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").AnchorOptions>;
    shadowOptions: {
        delegatesFocus: true;
    };
}> | undefined) => import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementRegistry<{
    baseName: string;
    baseClass: typeof FoundationAnchor;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<FoundationAnchor, any>, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").AnchorOptions>;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").AnchorOptions>;
    shadowOptions: {
        delegatesFocus: true;
    };
}, typeof Anchor>
```

## Remarks

Generates HTML Element: `<fast-anchor>`

[delegatesFocus](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ShadowRoot/delegatesFocus)
